scene.name: intro
scene.option: Are you going to explain all this to Harry?

scene.name: keep-moving
scene.line: I just mean ... what's another few minutes?

scene.name: harry
scene.line: Oh, uh ... No way. You're the smooth talker.
In fact ... I bet you'd have no problem explaining we had to stop out of the goodness of our nature, and check on some wayfaring strangers.

scene.name: decision
scene.option: Fine. Just for a few minutes, though.

scene.name: end-stop
scene.line: You're the best. And, hey, maybe if they're not busy they can fill some seats at the gig. You know if no one's there Harry'll try and bilk us on our fee.
